com.wingfoot.soap.encoding
Class SectionVSerializer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.wingfoot.soap.encoding.AbstractSerializer
        |
        +--com.wingfoot.soap.encoding.LiteralSerializer
              |
              +--com.wingfoot.soap.encoding.SectionVSerializer
All Implemented Interfaces:
SOAPSerializer
public class SectionVSerializer
extends LiteralSerializer
implements SOAPSerializer

Converts an Envelope (a.k.a serializes an Envelope) to a SOAP payload based on the rules specifed in SOAP 1.1 Section V. A SOAP payload created using Section V rules is popularly refered to as encoded using Section V encoding.

          Creates an instance of SectionVSerializer.

SectionVSerializer

                   throws SOAPException
Creates an instance of SectionVSerializer.
Parameters:
wsdlHolder - a WSDLHolder than contains the definition of the operations and parameters that is used to serialize the payload.
tmr - TypeMappingRegistry that maps the ComplexType to a Java class.
Method Detail

serialize

public byte[] serialize()
                 throws SOAPException
Takes each parameter in the Envelope and converts into SOAP payload according to the rules specified in SOAP 1.1 Section V. It is able to handle both RPC style and document style payload.
Specified by:
serialize in interface SOAPSerializer
Overrides:
serialize in class LiteralSerializer
Returns:
byte array of byte that is the binary representation of the SOAP payload.
Throws:
SOAPException - if any error occurs while generating the payload.

serializeParameter

public void serializeParameter(Part part,
                               java.lang.Object parameterValue,
                               Binding binding)
                        throws SOAPException
Converts a parameter whose data type is encapsulated in the WSDL as a Type into XML stub.
Parameters:
type - the definition of the parameterValue
parameterValue - the value of the parameter to be converted to XML.
Throws:
SOAPException - if the type is null.
